https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/jbFsvJYJPdWtmqUnE4XIFAHX3zw.jpg Set in the British seaside, Beautiful in the Morning is a coming of age story about Marielle, a girl who reconnects with the women in her family over a summer, only for them to be torn apart by the arrival of an intrusive stranger. Beautiful in the Morning
